rows.label: tlk45100141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I can't thank the mercenaries here
enough. Thanks to them, me and my
dad can live in peace!

rows.label: tlk45100141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
My dad's a scientist. He was being
chased by Invidian soldiers - they
wanted him to help develop weapons.

rows.label: tlk45100141_01_msg0004
rows.name:
They almost caught us, but the
mercenaries from here showed up
and saved us!

rows.label: tlk45100141_01_msg0005
rows.name:
They even gave us a place to live and
food to eat...they're such great people!
